OOC: I don't only have 17, I have 33 which clearly points I'm screwed. And
as for interaction, if I don't interact with myself then my characters could
to walk around for eternity. It's not fun interacting for me, altough I
don't know what it's like since everyone ignores my posts. And it depends on
what happens in the future as my staying. And the rules about a member only
being able to have 6 bots for each team screws me up, cause I happen to have
7 with the alliance so I'll have to make one leave. I'm not saying I hate
the new rules but they totally screwed my story lines and future ideas.

So, I guess I'll stay till I start to get tired of my stinky characters and
slice their legs off. I guess I'll post one of my characters leaving the
alliance and pretending I never brought those bots in. I thank anyone who
read their posts and found them amusing, or someone who read their posts.

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, May 04, 2001 1:27 AM
Subject: Re: (unknown)


> I don't wanna argue about that, because that would require going into
> uncivil conversation, but I urge you to think about staying. 17 chars
> are very hard to have interact anyways, and its better to interact
> with other people's characters than your own.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> > Yeah, but thats unfair to me because I post for all of my
> characters. And I
> > don't see anything childish about it cause I never said I hated the
> rule. I
> > simply said that I can't just get rid of those characters cause
> their the
